## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control. For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
